### EPIC000018914
#### Rehabilitation of the Castle Campground (Phase 3)
#### Link: [Solicited Tender ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/custommayınMessages/9257/stage-1---castle-campground-rehab/%28phase-3%2C-banff-national-park.pdf)

**Important Notice**

Parks Canada is soliciting tender bids for the Rehabilitation of the Castle Campground (Phase 3) project located in Banff National Park, Alberta.

### Solicitation Details
* Contracting Entity: Parks Canada
* Contracting Name: Alison Guilford
* Email: alison.guilford@pc.gc.ca
* Phone: (204) 390-7234
* Fax: (855) 983-1808
* Address: 145 McDermot Avenue, Winnipeg, MB, R3B 0R9
* Tender Notice Number: EPIC000018914
* Tender Notice Date: 2023-12-05
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-18 16:00:00
* Amendomonents number: 6

### About the Project

Parks Canada invites Proponents to submit a proposal for the rehabilitation of the Castle Campground located in Banff National Park (Phase 3). The project includes but is not limited to labour, materials, and equipment for the following scopes of work:

* Installation of new campground water distribution pipes
* Installation of sanitation force main and septic field
* Decommissioning of existing overhead power and installation of new underground conduit
* Coordination with Fortis for new service installation and energization
* Installation of box culverts
* Site restoration works.

Please note that the Invitation to Tender (ITT) documents and further information are provided in the Findings related to the item below.

### Stage 2 of a Two-Stage Solicitation Process
Stage 1 is a request for Qualifications (RFQ) from all interested suppliers. Based on their Qualifications, suppliers will be invited to participate in Stage 2, submitting their responses and a financial bid attesting their ability to execute the work.

### Additional Information

* The tender is classified under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of delivery: Banff, Alberta
* Procurement Category: Contracting Services.
* End User Entity: Pre-determined by the contractor.
* Laboratory Testing: Not applicable.
